role.title: Nurse Practitioner — Primary Care
role.summary: Provide primary care services to a diverse patient population at Green Valley Health's community clinic.
role.description:
Green Valley Health is seeking a compassionate and skilled Nurse Practitioner to join our primary care team. You will provide comprehensive healthcare services including diagnosis, treatment, and management of acute and chronic conditions for patients of all ages.

Key responsibilities:
- Conduct patient assessments, physical exams, and health screenings
- Diagnose and treat acute and chronic illnesses
- Prescribe medications and develop treatment plans
- Order and interpret diagnostic tests (labs, imaging)
- Provide patient education on preventive care and healthy lifestyle choices
- Collaborate with physicians, specialists, and allied health professionals
- Maintain accurate and timely documentation in the EHR system

organization.name: Green Valley Health
organization.description: Green Valley Health operates community health clinics across Bavaria, providing accessible primary care, preventive services, and chronic disease management to underserved populations.

experience.description: Minimum 2 years of clinical experience as a Nurse Practitioner or equivalent advanced practice role.

other: Ability to stand and move for extended periods (8+ hours)
Ability to lift up to 25 kg for patient assistance
Experience working with underserved or multicultural patient populations
Familiarity with German statutory health insurance (GKV) billing

bonus.details: Annual performance bonus based on patient satisfaction and quality metrics.

benefits.description: Supplementary private health and dental insurance.
Company pension plan (bAV) with employer contribution.
EUR 2,500 annual continuing education budget including paid study days.
benefits.details: Covers CME credits, conferences, and specialty certifications.

benefits.description: Generous parental leave with salary top-up.
Free annual health check-up and flu vaccination.
Professional liability insurance fully covered by employer.

growth.career_path: Nurse Practitioner → Lead NP → Clinical Director. Specialty tracks available in geriatrics, pediatrics, and chronic care management.

work_schedule.shift_details: Rotating shifts: early (07:00–15:00), late (12:00–20:00). Weekend rotation approximately 1 in 4. No overnight shifts.

stages.name: Application Review
stages.description: Review of CV, cover letter, and credential verification. Response within 10 business days.

stages.name: Phone Screen
stages.description: Brief call with HR to discuss role logistics, schedule, and salary expectations.

stages.name: Clinical Interview
stages.description: In-depth discussion of clinical competencies, case-based scenarios, and patient care philosophy.

stages.name: Onsite Trial Day
stages.description: Paid trial day at the clinic. Shadow the team, interact with patients (supervised), and experience the daily workflow.

stages.name: Offer
stages.description: Verbal offer followed by written contract within 5 business days.

culture.work_style: Our clinics are collaborative, patient-centered environments. Care teams meet daily for brief huddles and weekly for case reviews. We value work-life balance and maintain predictable schedules.
culture.dei_statement: Green Valley Health is committed to serving diverse communities and building a workforce that reflects the patients we serve. We are an equal opportunity employer and provide accommodations for disabilities.

physical_requirements: Standing and walking for extended periods (8+ hours)
